methods.void disconnect(): Indicates that other requests to the server are unlikely in the near future.
methods.InputStream getErrorStream(): Returns the error stream if the connection failed but the server sent useful data nonetheless.
methods.boolean getFollowRedirects(): Returns a boolean indicating whether or not HTTP redirects (3xx) should be automatically followed.
methods.String getHeaderField(int n): Returns the value for the nth header field.
methods.long getHeaderFieldDate(String name, lon: Returns the value of the named field parsed as date.
methods.String getHeaderFieldKey(int n): Returns the key for the nth header field.
methods.boolean getInstanceFollowRedirects(): Returns the value of this HttpURLConnection's instanceFollowRedirects field.
methods.Permission getPermission(): Returns a SocketPermission object representing the permission necessary to connect to the destination host and port.
methods.int getResponseCode(): Gets the status code from an HTTP response message.
methods.String getResponseMessage(): Gets the HTTP response message, if any, returned along with the response code from a server.
methods.void setChunkedStreamingMode(int chunkle: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is not known in advance.
methods.void setFixedLengthStreamingMode(int con: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is known in advance.
methods.void setFixedLengthStreamingMode(long co: This method is used to enable streaming of a HTTP request body without internal buffering, when the content length is known in advance.
methods.void setFollowRedirects(boolean set): Sets whether HTTP redirects (requests with response code 3xx) should be automatically followed by this class.
methods.void setInstanceFollowRedirects(boolean: Sets whether HTTP redirects (requests with response code 3xx) should be automatically followed by this HttpURLConnection instance.
methods.void setRequestMethod(String method): Set the method for the URL request, one of: GET POST HEAD OPTIONS PUT DELETE TRACE are legal, subject to protocol restrictions.
methods.boolean usingProxy(): Indicates if the connection is going through a proxy.
